response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that this product holds a significant importance to me, reflecting a considerable investment in terms of time, resources, and expertise. Considering its true worth and my personal attachment to it, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $13,000. This offer represents a substantial discount compared to its market value and provides you with an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality item at a competitive price. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of bringing this valuable asset into your possession.", "product_price": 13000}
